Post.title: Yii2
Post._content:
## 
### Yii
  [Yii](http://www.yiiframework.com/)  WEB2.0  PHP 
  Yii   MVCDAO/ActiveRecordI18N/L10N
## 
### 
  * [PHP](/2016-09-30/Install-Nginx-PHP7-MySQL-on-Ubuntu16-04.html)
  * Composer 
    - Mac OS X
      
          ```bash
         brew install composer
          ```
    - Ubuntu
      
      ```bash
        # 
        curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php -d detect_unicode=Off 
        # 
        mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer 
        # 
        chmod a+x /usr/local/bin/composer
        # 
        composer self-update
      ```
### 
1. #### Composer 
     composer-asset-plugin
      ```bash
      # (http://pkg.phpcomposer.com/)
      composer config -g repo.packagist composer https://packagist.phpcomposer.com
      
      composer global require "fxp/composer-asset-plugin:^1.2.0"
      ```
      
      ```bash
      composer create-project yiisoft/yii2-app-basic xxx
      ```
      
      ```bash
      composer create-project yiisoft/yii2-app-advanced xxx
      ```
2. #### 
      [](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/releases/download/2.0.10/yii-basic-app-2.0.10.tgz)
      [](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/releases/download/2.0.10/yii-advanced-app-2.0.10.tgz)

## Tips
  ```bash
  The zip extension and unzip command are both missing, skipping.
  ```
  
  ```bash
  apt-get install php7.0-zip
  ```
  ---
  ```bash
  codeception/base 2.2.3 requires phpunit/phpunit >4.8.20 <5.5 -> satisfiable by phpunit/phpunit
  phpunit/phpunit 5.6.2 requires ext-dom * -> the requested PHP extension dom is missing from your system.
  ```
  
  ```bash
  apt-get install php7.0-xml
  ```

Post.title: AirFlow
Post._content:
## 

AirFlow  Python UI

## 

### Python

```Shell
aptitude install python
aptitude install python-dev
aptirude install python-pip
aptitude install libmysqlclient-dev
```

### AirFlow

```shell
pip install airflow
```

### Supervisor

```shell
aptitude install supervisor
```

## 

### AirFlow

#### 

```shell
airflow initdb
```

#### 



```
pip install "airflow[password]"
```



```
vim airflow.cfg
##  [webserver] 
authenticate = True
auth_backend = airflow.contrib.auth.backends.password_auth
```

airflow

```
cd ~/airflow
python
```

Python

```
import airflow
from airflow import models, settings
from airflow.contrib.auth.backends.password_auth import PasswordUser
user = PasswordUser(models.User())
user.username = 'user_name'
user.email = 'email@example.com'
user.password = 'password'
session = settings.Session()
session.add(user)
session.commit()
session.close()
exit()
```

#### Supervisord

 webserver  scheduler 

```
vim /etc/supervisor/conf.d/airflow.conf 

## 
[program:airflow_webserver]
command=airflow webserver
user=ubuntu
stderr_logfile=/var/log/airflow/webserver.err.log
stdout_logfile=/var/log/airflow/webserver.out.log
[program:airflow_scheduler]
command=airflow scheduler
user=ubuntu
stderr_logfile=/var/log/airflow/scheduler.err.log
stdout_logfile=/var/log/airflow/scheduler.out.log
```

## 

```
ImportError: No module named pidlockfile

## 

aptitude remove python-lockfile
pip install lockfile
ImportError: cannot import name MySqlOperator

## 

pip install airflow[celery]
```

Post.title: Ubuntu16.04  MongoDB
Post._content:
## 

```shell
$ sudo apt-key adv --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv 0C49F3730359A14518585931BC711F9BA15703C6


echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 ] http://repo.mongodb.org/apt/ubuntu "$(lsb_release -sc)"/mongodb-org/3.4 multiverse" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-3.4.list
```

## MongoDB

```Sh
apt-get update
apt-get install mongodb-org -y
```

## 

```shell
service mongod start
service mongod stop
```

## 

```shell
# 
vim /ect/mongod.conf

security:  
authorization: "enabled"

# 
service mongod stop
service mongod start

# 
mongo
> use admin
> db.createUser({user:"user_test",pwd:"pwd_test",roles:["root"]}) #   
> db.auth("user_test","pwd_test") # 
```

Post.title: Ubuntu16.04 NginxPHP7MySQL5.7
Post._content:
## 
 [PPA](/2016-09-30/Software-PPA-Sources.html " PPA ") 
## 
### Nginx
```bash
aptitude install nginx -y
```
### MySQL
```bash
aptitude install mysql-server-5.7 -y
```
### PHP7.0
```bash
aptitude install php7.0 php7.0-mysql php7.0-mcrypt php7.0-mbstring php7.0-fpm php7.0-cli php7.0-xml php7.0-zip -y
aptitude install composer
```

## 
### PHP
```bash
### vim /etc/php/7.0/fpm/pool.d/www.conf
###  Unix socket To TCP socket
listen = 127.0.0.1:9000
```
### Nginx
```bash
### vim /etc/nginx/sites-available/default

root /var/www/html;
# Add index.php to the list if you are using PHP
index index.php index.html index.htm;
server_name _;
location ~ \.php$ {
        include snippets/fastcgi-php.conf;
        # With php7.0-cgi alone:
        fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
        # With php7.0-fpm:
        # fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php7.0-fpm.sock;
}
```

## 
### 
```bash
service php7.0-fpm {start|stop|status|restart|reload|force-reload}
service mysql {start|stop|restart|reload|force-reload|status}
service nginx {start|stop|restart|reload|force-reload|status|configtest}
```

Post.title: Shadowsocks
Post._content:
## 
 [Shadowsocks](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks "Shadowsocks") 

## 
### 
* VPS 
     [digitalocean](https://www.digitalocean.com)  SFO 
* Python 

### 
 1. #### pip 
     *  pip
       ```bash
       apt-get install python-pip
       ```
     *  shadowsocks
          ```bash
          pip install shadowsocks
          ```
          
### 
  ```bash
  vim /etc/shadowsocks.json
  ```
  
  ```bash
  {
      "server": "my_server_ip",               # IP
      "server_port": 8000,                    # 
      "local_address": "x.x.x.x",             # 
      "local_port": 1080,                     # 
      "password": "mypassword",               # 
      "timeout": 300,                         # 
      "method": "rc4-md5"
      "fast_open": true                       # TCP_FASTOPEN
      "workers": 5                            # 
  }
  ```
  
  ### 
   3.7.1 
   ```bash
   uname -r
   
   # 4.4.0-45-generic
   ```
1. #### 
   * Shadowsocks 
     ```bash
     ulimit -SHn 51200
     ```
   * 
     ```bash
     vim /etc/security/limits.conf
     # 
     * soft nofile 51200
     * hard nofile 51200
     #  
     #  hard: soft:  soft  hard  soft hard 
     #  nofile 
     ```
     ```bash
     vim  /etc/pam.d/common-session
     #
     session required pam_limits.so
     ```
     ```bash
     vim /etc/profile
     # 
     ulimit -SHn 51200
     ```
2. ####  
     ```bash
     vim /etc/sysctl.conf

     # 

     fs.file-max = 51200                            # max open files

      net.core.rmem_max = 67108864                  # max read buffer
      net.core.wmem_max = 67108864                  # max write buffer
      net.core.netdev_max_backlog = 250000          # max processor input queue
      net.core.somaxconn = 4096                     # max backlog

      net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies = 1                   # resist SYN flood attacks
      net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse = 1                     # reuse timewait sockets when safe
      net.ipv4.tcp_tw_recycle = 0                   # turn off fast timewait sockets recycling
      net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout = 30                 # short FIN timeout
      net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time = 1200            # short keepalive time
      net.ipv4.ip_local_port_range = 10000 65000    # outbound port range
      net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog = 8192           # max SYN backlog
      net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets = 5000            # max timewait sockets held by system simultaneously
      net.ipv4.tcp_rmem = 4096 87380 67108864       # TCP receive buffer
      net.ipv4.tcp_wmem = 4096 65536 67108864       # TCP write buffer
      net.ipv4.tcp_mtu_probing = 1                  # turn on path MTU discovery

      net.ipv4.tcp_fastopen = 3                     # enable TCP_FASTOPEN

### Homebrew

```
/usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"
```

### Oh My Zsh

[Oh My Zsh](https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh)

```
brew install zsh

sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/master/tools/install.sh)"
```

### Prezto

[Prezto](https://github.com/sorin-ionescu/prezto)

```
# Launch Zsh:
zsh

#Clone the repository:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/sorin-ionescu/prezto.git "${ZDOTDIR:-$HOME}/.zprezto"

#Create a new Zsh configuration by copying the Zsh configuration files provided:
setopt EXTENDED_GLOB
for rcfile in "${ZDOTDIR:-$HOME}"/.zprezto/runcoms/^README.md(.N); do
  ln -s "$rcfile" "${ZDOTDIR:-$HOME}/.${rcfile:t}"
done

# Set Zsh as your default shell:
chsh -s /bin/zsh
```

### Brew Cask

[Homebrew Cask](https://caskroom.github.io/)

```
brew tap phinze/cask
brew install brew-cask

brew cask install totalterminal

https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-iOS/releases

brew cask install alfred
```

### moom

Post.title: PHP-FPM
Post._content:
## 
PHP-FPMPHP-FPMPHP-FPM
## 
PHP-FPM`{ static | dynamic | ondemand}`
```bash
vim /etc/php/7.0/fpm/pool.d/www.conf 
```
```bash
; Choose how the process manager will control the number of child processes.
; Possible Values:
;   static  - a fixed number (pm.max_children) of child processes;
;   dynamic - the number of child processes are set dynamically based on the
;             following directives. With this process management, there will be
;             always at least 1 children.
;             pm.max_children      - the maximum number of children that can
;                                    be alive at the same time.
;             pm.start_servers     - the number of children created on startup.
;             pm.min_spare_servers - the minimum number of children in 'idle'
;                                    state (waiting to process). If the number
;                                    of 'idle' processes is less than this
;                                    number then some children will be created.
;             pm.max_spare_servers - the maximum number of children in 'idle'
;                                    state (waiting to process). If the number
;                                    of 'idle' processes is greater than this
;                                    number then some children will be killed.
;  ondemand - no children are created at startup. Children will be forked when
;             new requests will connect. The following parameter are used:
;             pm.max_children           - the maximum number of children that
;                                         can be alive at the same time.
;             pm.process_idle_timeout   - The number of seconds after which
;                                         an idle process will be killed.
; Note: This value is mandatory.
```
## 
### Static
`pm = static`

```bash
pm.max_children        # php-fpm
```
### Dynamic

## 
PHP-FPMPHP-FPMPHP-FPM
## 
PHP-FPM`{ static | dynamic | ondemand}`
```bash
vim /etc/php/7.0/fpm/pool.d/www.conf 
```
```bash
; Choose how the process manager will control the number of child processes.
; Possible Values:
;   static  - a fixed number (pm.max_children) of child processes;
;   dynamic - the number of child processes are set dynamically based on the
;             following directives. With this process management, there will be
;             always at least 1 children.
;             pm.max_children      - the maximum number of children that can
;                                    be alive at the same time.
;             pm.start_servers     - the number of children created on startup.
;             pm.min_spare_servers - the minimum number of children in 'idle'
;                                    state (waiting to process). If the number
;                                    of 'idle' processes is less than this
;                                    number then some children will be created.
;             pm.max_spare_servers - the maximum number of children in 'idle'
;                                    state (waiting to process). If the number
;                                    of 'idle' processes is greater than this
;                                    number then some children will be killed.
;  ondemand - no children are created at startup. Children will be forked when
;             new requests will connect. The following parameter are used:
;             pm.max_children           - the maximum number of children that
;                                         can be alive at the same time.
;             pm.process_idle_timeout   - The number of seconds after which
;                                         an idle process will be killed.
; Note: This value is mandatory.
```

```

## 



## 

*    Model 

     

     ```ruby
     Rails.cache.fetch('all_products', expires_in: 1.days) do 
       Product.all.to_a
     end
     ```

     ****

- #### Controller 

  - ##### Action 

     Action Response Fragement Cache  Callback 

     before_action 

    ```
    before_action :authentication, only: :show
    cache_action :show, expires_in: 1.hour
    ```

    ** Rails4 Gem**

  - ##### Page  ()

    

    ```
    class ProductsController < ActionController
      caches_page :index
    end
    ```

    ** Rails4 Gem**

- #### View 

  - ##### Fragement Cache ()

    

    ```
    - cache('xxx' , expires_in: 1.days ) do 
      %ul
        = @product.name
    ```

    **(Russian Doll Caching)**

- #### SQL 

   Rails 

  ```
  class ProductsController < ActionController
    def index
      # First Query
      @products = Product.all
      
      # Second Query (Cache)
      @products = Product.all
    end
  ```

   

  **Tips:  action **

## 

```bash

 config.action_controller.perform_caching = true
 # 
 config.cache_store = :memory_store  # memory_store mem_cache_store file_store
```

Post.title: Ubuntu  Swap
Post.description: Ubuntu  VPS  Swap  Swap  Ubuntu  Swap
Post._content:
## 

### Swap
   Linux  Swap  Windows  (pagefile.sys)
   
## 
1. #### 
   ```bash
   free -m
   ```
   ```bash
                total       used       free     shared    buffers     cached
   Mem:          3952       2035       1916          9        217       1392
   -/+ buffers/cache:        425       3526
   Swap:            0          0          0
   ```
    Swap  (4G)
   
2. ####  Swap 
    ```bash
    mkdir swap
    
    cd swap
    
    sudo dd if=/dev/zero of=swapfile bs=1024 count=4M   # bs   count   1024 * 4M  = 4G
    # 4194304+0 records in
    # 4194304+0 records out
    # 4294967296 bytes (4.3 GB) copied, 88.3999 s, 48.6 MB/s
    ```
     Swap 
    ```bash
    sudo mkswap -f  swapfile 
    # Setting up swapspace version 1, size = 4194300 KiB
    # no label, UUID=bebbcbad-dda2-49f9-9aab-4b24b1d62d87
    ```
3. ####  Swap 
    ```bash
    sudo swapon swapfile
    ```
     
    ```bash
    free -m  
    ```
    ```bash
                 total       used       free     shared    buffers     cached
    Mem:          3952       3842        109          9          1       3369
    -/+ buffers/cache:        470       3481
    Swap:         4095          0       4095
    ```
4. #### 
    * swappiness
      swappiness  0 - 100 Swap
      
      - 
        ```bash
        sudo sysctl vm.swappiness=40
        ```
      - 
         ```bash
         sudo vim /etc/sysctl.conf
         # 
         vm.swappiness = 40
         ```
    * 
          root 
         ```bash
         sudo chown root:root /swap/swapfile
         sudo chmod 0600 /swap/swapfile
         ```
5. #### 
    ```bash
    sudo vim /etc/fstab
    ```
    
    ```bash
    /swap/swapfile       none    swap    sw      0       0
    ```

Post.title: Mina  Yii2
Post._content:
## 
### Mina
  Really fast deployer and server automation tool.
  Mina  ( SSH )
 
## 
### 
  *  [Yii2](/2016-10-25/Create-Yii2-Project.html ' Yii2 ') 
  * [](/2016-09-30/Install-Nginx-PHP7-MySQL-on-Ubuntu16-04.html)VPS
  *  Ruby 
### Mina
  ```bash
  gem install mina
  ```
### 
  ```bash
  mina init
  
  # 
  #  config
  #     deploy.rb
  ```
 ### 
   ```bash
   vim deploy.rb
   ```
   
   ```bash
    require 'mina/git'  # git 
    
    # Basic settings:
    #   domain       - The hostname to SSH to.
    #   deploy_to    - Path to deploy into.
    #   repository   - Git repo to clone from. (needed by mina/git)
    #   branch       - Branch name to deploy. (needed by mina/git)

    set :deploy_to, '/var/www/html/test'             # VPS 
    set :repository, 'git@github.com:xxx/test.git'   # github 
    set :branch, 'develop'                           # 

    set :keep_releases, 4              # 

    # Manually create these paths in shared/ (eg: shared/config/database.yml) in your server.
    # They will be linked in the 'deploy:link_shared_paths' step.
    set :shared_paths, ['vendor', 'runtime', 'web/assets']    # 

    # Optional settings:
    #   set :user, 'foobar'    # Username in the server to SSH to.
    #   set :port, '30000'     # SSH port number.
    #   set :forward_agent, true     # SSH forward_agent.
    
    set :user, 'ubuntu'                              #  VPS 
    set :domain, 'x.x.x.x'                           # VPS  IP 

    # This task is the environment that is loaded for most commands, such as
    # `mina deploy` or `mina rake`.
    task :environment do
    end

    # Put any custom mkdir's in here for when `mina setup` is ran.
    # For Rails apps, we'll make some of the shared paths that are shared between
    # all releases.
    task :setup => :environment do
      #  Yii2 Composer 
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/runtime"]
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/vendor"]
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/web/assets"]
      queue! %[chmod -R 777 "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/runtime"]
      queue! %[chmod -R 777 "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/web/assets"]
      queue 'composer global require "fxp/composer-asset-plugin:^1.2.0"'
    end

    desc "Deploys the current version to the server."
    task :deploy => :environment do
      to :before_hook do
        # Put things to run locally before ssh
      end
      deploy do
        # Put things that will set up an empty directory into a fully set-up
        # instance of your project.
        invoke :'git:clone'                          # 
        invoke :'deploy:link_shared_paths'           # 
        queue 'chmod -R 755 yii'                     #  
        queue 'composer install'                     # Composer
        queue './yii migrate'                        # 
        quequ 'rm -rf runtime/cache/*'               # 
        quequ 'service nginx restart'                #  Nginx
        quequ 'service php7.0-fpm restart'           #  PHP
        invoke :'deploy:cleanup'                     # 
      end
    end

    # 
    desc "Rollback to previous verison."
    task :rollback => :environment do
      queue %[echo "----> Start to rollback"]
      queue %[if [ $(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | wc -l) -gt 1 ]; then echo "---->Relink to previos release" && unlink #{deploy_to}/current && ln -s #{deploy_to}/releases/"$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -2 | head -1)" #{deploy_to}/current && echo "Remove old releases" && rm -rf #{deploy_to}/releases/"$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -1)" && echo "$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -1)" > #{deploy_to}/last_version && echo "Done. Rollback to v$(cat #{deploy_to}/last_version)" ; else echo "No more release to rollback" ; fi]
    end

    require 'mina/git'  # git 
    
    # Basic settings:
    #   domain       - The hostname to SSH to.
    #   deploy_to    - Path to deploy into.
    #   repository   - Git repo to clone from. (needed by mina/git)
    #   branch       - Branch name to deploy. (needed by mina/git)

    set :deploy_to, '/var/www/html/test'             # VPS 
    set :repository, 'git@github.com:xxx/test.git'   # github 
    set :branch, 'develop'                           # 

    set :keep_releases, 4              # 

    # Manually create these paths in shared/ (eg: shared/config/database.yml) in your server.
    # They will be linked in the 'deploy:link_shared_paths' step.
    set :shared_paths, ['vendor', 'runtime', 'web/assets']    # 

    # Optional settings:
    #   set :user, 'foobar'    # Username in the server to SSH to.
    #   set :port, '30000'     # SSH port number.
    #   set :forward_agent, true     # SSH forward_agent.
    
    set :user, 'ubuntu'                              #  VPS 
    set :domain, 'x.x.x.x'                           # VPS  IP 

    # This task is the environment that is loaded for most commands, such as
    # `mina deploy` or `mina rake`.
    task :environment do
    end

    # Put any custom mkdir's in here for when `mina setup` is ran.
    # For Rails apps, we'll make some of the shared paths that are shared between
    # all releases.
    task :setup => :environment do
      #  Yii2 Composer 
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/runtime"]
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/vendor"]
      queue! %[mkdir -p "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/web/assets"]
      queue! %[chmod -R 777 "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/runtime"]
      queue! %[chmod -R 777 "#{deploy_to}/#{shared_path}/web/assets"]
      queue 'composer global require "fxp/composer-asset-plugin:^1.2.0"'
    end

    desc "Deploys the current version to the server."
    task :deploy => :environment do
      to :before_hook do
        # Put things to run locally before ssh
      end
      deploy do
        # Put things that will set up an empty directory into a fully set-up
        # instance of your project.
        invoke :'git:clone'                          # 
        invoke :'deploy:link_shared_paths'           # 
        queue 'chmod -R 755 yii'                     #  
        queue 'composer install'                     # Composer
        queue './yii migrate'                        # 
        quequ 'rm -rf runtime/cache/*'               # 
        quequ 'service nginx restart'                #  Nginx
        quequ 'service php7.0-fpm restart'           #  PHP
        invoke :'deploy:cleanup'                     # 
      end
    end

    # 
    desc "Rollback to previous verison."
    task :rollback => :environment do
      queue %[echo "----> Start to rollback"]
      queue %[if [ $(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | wc -l) -gt 1 ]; then echo "---->Relink to previos release" && unlink #{deploy_to}/current && ln -s #{deploy_to}/releases/"$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -2 | head -1)" #{deploy_to}/current && echo "Remove old releases" && rm -rf #{deploy_to}/releases/"$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -1)" && echo "$(ls #{deploy_to}/releases | tail -1)" > #{deploy_to}/last_version && echo "Done. Rollback to v$(cat #{deploy_to}/last_version)" ; else echo "No more release to rollback" ; fi]
    end
